item.title: Attack speed
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

if your on a [PI] you need to go to combatassistant.java and search for:

then find the case for whip so

then find the return statement right underneath it…the lower the number the faster it will hit…

if you cant find 13758 then you need to add it

case 13758: return 4;

that will make it alil faster than normal

(normal is 5)

like i said the lower the number the faster it will hit

case 13758: // ULTIMATE WHIP
if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) {
Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx100(341);
}
c.specAccuracy = 1.10;
c.startAnimation(1658);
